# Car Database

This page contains the last week of Toyota Camry listings. Estimated price was determined using a regression model and discounts were calculated using the difference of estimated price and the listing price.
$$
Discount = Estimated\ Price - Listing\ Price
$$

This data was last updated at `r format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")`.

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
# Load necessary libraries
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(rmarkdown)

# Read the CSV file from the remote location
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MMel099/UsedCarPricer/main/data/seven_day_data.csv"
data <- as.data.frame(read_csv(url))

DT::datatable(data, filter = 'top')
```
